description.value:
Hardened: Death worlders are accustomed to violence. In addition, many death worlds contain many venomous predators.

This talent is gained during character creation from the Death World origin. You must choose either Jaded or Resistance (Poisons) when you take this talent.

system.benefit: Choose one: Gain the Jaded talent (immune to mundane horrors and fear effects from natural sources) OR Resistance (Poisons) talent (+10 to resist poison effects).
system.notes: This talent represents the choice between Jaded or Resistance (Poisons). The specific choice should be noted in the specialization field.
